description: Archaeologists in France may have located a lost Roman canal built during the Cimbrian Wars. The Marius Canal, ordered by Gaius Marius, was a crucial supply route for Roman troops fighting the Cimbri and Teutones between 104 and 102 B.C. Researchers have identified structures in the Rhône River delta matching Roman engineering standards, including ceramic fragments, cobblestone platforms, and wooden stakes. Ongoing excavations aim to confirm whether this was indeed the historic canal mentioned by Pliny the Elder.
title: Archaeologists May Have Found 2,100-Year-Old Roman Canal Built by Gaius Marius in Southern France

description: On March 24, a glowing spiral appeared in the night sky across parts of Europe, including the UK, Sweden, Croatia, Poland, and Hungary. The formation lasted for about 12 minutes before fading. Experts confirmed it was caused by a SpaceX Falcon 9 rocket reentering Earth's atmosphere after completing its mission. The phenomenon resulted from frozen fuel particles reflecting sunlight. Similar spirals have been recorded before due to increasing rocket launches, with sightings reported in Alaska, Hawaii, and Europe in recent years.
title: Mysterious Light Spiral Over Europe Traced to SpaceX Falcon 9 Reentry

description: Rocket Lab successfully launched eight satellites into orbit for OroraTech on March 26. The mission, "Finding Hot Wildfires Near You," aims to improve real-time wildfire detection through thermal infrared imaging. The satellites will join OroraTech’s existing network, operating at a 97-degree inclination, 550 km above Earth. CEO Martin Langer highlighted the system’s ability to provide real-time fire data, accessible via mobile devices. The mission was completed within four months, ensuring the satellites were active before peak wildfire season. This marks Rocket Lab’s fifth launch of the year.
title: Rocket Lab Deploys Eight Satellites to Boost Global Wildfire Monitoring

description: The James Webb Space Telescope has provided the first-ever direct images of Neptune’s auroras, revealing surprising details about the ice giant’s atmosphere. Unlike auroras on Earth, Jupiter, or Saturn, Neptune’s auroras appear across unexpected locations due to its tilted and offset magnetic field. Scientists also detected the presence of H₃⁺, a key ion linked to auroral emissions. Temperature data from JWST showed a significant cooling in Neptune’s upper atmosphere since Voyager 2’s 1989 flyby. These findings set a new benchmark for future studies of outer planets.
title: James Webb Telescope Captures Neptune’s Auroras in Stunning Detail

description: A silicon-free transistor developed in China may revolutionise chip technology. According to reports, the 2D transistor, designed with bismuth oxyselenide, could enhance processor speeds by 40% while lowering power use by 10%. The gate-all-around field-effect transistor (GAAFET) architecture is said to offer better efficiency and flexibility compared to silicon-based alternatives. If successfully implemented, this innovation may allow China to bypass restrictions on advanced chip technology and move towards independent semiconductor production.
title: China’s 2D Transistor Could Transform Processors with Higher Speeds and Efficiency

description: Isar Aerospace's Spectrum rocket was set to launch from Norway’s Andøya Spaceport but was delayed due to strong winds. The maiden flight was scheduled within a three-hour launch window on March 24. The company confirmed that both the rocket and infrastructure remain unaffected, and a new launch window is being determined. The test flight, which carries no payload, is focused on gathering technical data. Future launches include an agreement with the Norwegian Space Agency for Arctic Ocean Surveillance satellites.
title: First Orbital Rocket Launch from European Soil Delayed Due to Winds

description: NASA is considering another test flight for Boeing’s CST-100 Starliner before it is used for crew rotations to the International Space Station. Reports suggest that propulsion system issues, including helium leaks and thruster failures, are still being investigated. NASA’s Steve Stich has stated that Boeing is testing new seals and propulsion components to prevent further problems. While Boeing has taken significant financial losses, company executives remain committed to the program. A final decision on the Starliner’s crew rotation role is expected by summer.
title: NASA Plans Another Starliner Test Flight Amid Propulsion System Challenges

description: The gripping legal thriller Vijay LLB: The Advocate is now available for streaming on Aha Video and Sony Liv. Directed by M Mathialagan, the film follows Vijay, a young lawyer determined to prove his childhood friend Venthan’s innocence in a murder case. As Vijay fights against corruption and power, the film delivers a compelling courtroom drama. Starring Raaga Uthaya, Ashraf Navaghani, and Kannan Rajamanickam, the movie has been well received, earning an IMDb rating of 8.2. Watch Vijay LLB: The Advocate now for an intense legal showdown.
title: M. Mathialagan’s Vijay LLB Now Streaming on Aha: Everything You Need to Know

description: A new study has put forward a black hole model that eliminates the central singularity, a concept that has long troubled physicists. Researchers suggest modifying Einstein’s field equations to prevent mathematical values from reaching infinity at a black hole’s core. This approach could reshape our understanding of gravity, black holes, and even the universe itself. The findings hint at a possible connection between black hole physics and quantum gravity, opening the door for further research into one of the most enigmatic aspects of the cosmos.
title: New Black Hole Theory Challenges Singularity: What You Need to Know

description: A new ballet drama, Étoile, arrives on Prime Video on April 24. Created by Amy Sherman-Palladino and Daniel Palladino, the series follows two ballet companies—one in Paris and one in New York—swapping their best dancers in an effort to revitalise interest in the art form. The show stars Luke Kirby, Charlotte Gainsbourg, and real-life ballerinas Unity Phelan and Tiler Peck. With themes of artistic ambition and industry survival, Étoile aims to bring the world of classical ballet to life.
title: Étoile OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: The first Dolby Vision cinema grading facility in Annapurna Studios in Hyderabad is a state-of-the-art facility that offers solutions to filmmakers for any mixing requirements. The post-production facility for the cinema has all the latest tools and gives filmmakers the freedom to go all out with creative freedom. Dolby Vision will elevate the movie-going experience, and we are excited to see what's next in this chapter. Here's a complete walkthrough of what happened when Gadgets 360 visited India's first Dolby-certified facility.
title: India’s First Dolby Vision Post-Production Facility at Annapurna Studios Unlocks New Creative Possibilities for Filmmakers

description: The Poco M7 Pro is a budget smartphone that offers a big display, a big battery, and a big relief to your pocket. It is equipped with a MediaTek Dimensity 7025 Ultra chipset, a 50-megapixel primary rear camera, a 6.67-inch AMOLED display with 120Hz refresh rate, and a 5,110mAh battery. All of this is available at a starting price of Rs. 14,999, but does that make it a good buy? Read our review to find out.
title: Poco M7 Pro Review: Pro Value, Practical Performance
